## Review focus

<!-- What should reviewers pay attention to? Delete if not applicable. -->

- [ ] **Technical accuracy** - Does the content correctly describe the feature/behavior?
- [ ] **Completeness** - Is anything missing that users need?
- [ ] **Code examples** - Do the examples work and follow best practices?

## Automated checks

The following are checked automatically:

| Check | Coverage |
|-------|----------|
| **Copilot** | Structure, grammar, style suggestions |
| **Vale** | Writing style, spelling, branding |
| **Link checker** | Broken internal/external links |
| **Prettier** | Code formatting |

## Checklist

- [ ] Signed the [InfluxData CLA](https://www.influxdata.com/legal/cla/) ([if necessary](https://github.com/influxdata/docs-v2/blob/master/DOCS-CONTRIBUTING.md#sign-the-influxdata-cla))
- [ ] Rebased/mergeable
- [ ] Local build passes (`npx hugo --quiet`)

- Open as Draft until ready for review to avoid notification spam
- CODEOWNERS auto-assigns reviewers based on files changed
- Copilot reviews code/content automatically - address suggestions before requesting human review
